title: Genetica
description:
Genetica provides 1,000+ different genetic reports about an individual during his/her lifetime. Those reports enable access to personalized and optimal nutrition and fitness plans and the individual’s awareness of his/her inborn references and talents. 

Genetica reports also provide polygenic scores of the risk of hereditary diseases such as cancers and diabetes; or disorders such as Autism Spectrum Disorder and Attention-Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder,...

Decode your genes today and get your reports in 3 easy steps:

- Purchase a saliva collection kit via Genetica app

- Your test kit will be delivered directly to your address. Collect your saliva, send back to Genetica, and scan the barcode on the tube to track the progress of your sample in real-time.

- Once your results are ready, open the Genetica application to see your reports.

Our team of scientists and genetic experts have developed Genetica® proprietary technology, which applies Artificial Intelligence in decoding your genes. Based on your results, we will also provide you with actionable recommendations to start improving your life immediately. 

Genetica services are currently available in the USA, Canada, Singapore, Indonesia, Thailand, and Vietnam.

Genetica provides 1,000+ different genetic reports about an individual during his/her lifetime. Those reports enable access to personalized and optimal nutrition and fitness plans and the individual’s awareness of his/her inborn references and talents.

Genetica reports also provide polygenic scores of the risk of hereditary diseases such as cancers and diabetes; or disorders such as Autism Spectrum Disorder and Attention-Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder,...

Decode your genes today and get your reports in 3 easy steps:

- Purchase a saliva collection kit via Genetica app

- Your test kit will be delivered directly to your address. Collect your saliva, send back to Genetica, and scan the barcode on the tube to track the progress of your sample in real-time.

- Once your results are ready, open the Genetica application to see your reports.

Our team of scientists and genetic experts have developed Genetica® proprietary technology, which applies Artificial Intelligence in decoding your genes. Based on your results, we will also provide you with actionable recommendations to start improving your life immediately.

Genetica services are currently available in the USA, Canada, Singapore, Indonesia, Thailand, and Vietnam.
